CONCLUSION: Violation of Art. 6-1;Violation of P1-1;Pecuniary damage - claim dismissed;Non-pecuniary damage - financial award
TEXT: CARDINAL . The applicant was born in DATE and resides in the town of GPE , GPE region , GPE .
CARDINAL . The applicant instituted proceedings in the ORG of GPE against ORG No . CARDINAL - a ORG - owned enterprise - to recover salary arrears .

CARDINAL . On DATE the ORG found in favour of the applicant ( ORG городского суда PERSON области ) and awarded her ORG CARDINAL,CARDINAL.CARDINAL . On DATE ORG ( PERSON исполнительной службы Новогродовского городского управления юстиции ) initiated the enforcement proceedings .

CARDINAL . NORP In DATE ORG was reorganised and became a structural subdivision of ORG . As the latter thereby became the debtor , in DATE the enforcement proceedings were transferred to the ORG ( PERSON исполнительной службы Селидовского городского управления юстиции ) .

CARDINAL . In DATE the applicant instituted proceedings in the ORG of GPE against ORG for failure to enforce the court decision in her favour . On DATE ORG rejected the applicant ’s claim , finding that no fault had been committed by ORG . The court stated that ORG had acted properly in taking steps to enforce the decision of DATE . However , by a number of decisions of ORG of GPE , ORG had been prohibited from selling the property of ORG , due to the bankruptcy proceedings which had been initiated against the company . The court also stated that , according to the PERSON on the Introduction of a Moratorium on the Forced Sale of Property , on DATE a ban on the forced sale of assets belonging to undertakings in which the ORG held PERCENT of the share capital had been introduced . On DATE ORG upheld the decision of the first instance court of DATE . The applicant appealed in cassation to ORG . The proceedings are still pending .
CARDINAL . In DATE the applicant has received ORG CARDINAL,CARDINAL.CARDINAL , the rest of the debt remains unpaid .

CARDINAL . The applicant instituted proceedings in the ORG against the Selidovskiy ORG claiming compensation for material and moral damage caused by a lengthy non - enforcement of the judgment in her favour . On DATE the court found against the applicant . On DATE ORG of GPE upheld this judgment . On DATE the ORG provided the applicant a time - limit until DATE for lodging her cassation appeal in compliance with procedural requirements prescribed by law . The parties did not submit any further information about these proceedings .
CARDINAL . NORP The relevant domestic law is summarised in the judgment of ORG v. GPE ( no . CARDINAL/CARDINAL , § CARDINAL , DATE ) .
